name: Project Blaze
changelog:
• Added BT helper for reading AirPods stats (like battery)
  • Include NoName prebuilt -> Fixed OTG/MTP and made a bit better bb
  • Fixed SystemUI tuner option
  • Made FOD dimming a bit better
  • Added two-tone accent qs style. (when applied, reboot systemui)
notes:
• CLEAN FLASH MANDATORY
  • Known issues: Screen off fod, and AOD while not charging device doesn't really work
  • Play integrity not passing by default
  • Non RDP
  • With Gapps
  • 912 and any other kernel which haven't been updated won't work qpr2+ roms
